description: Poseidon package format version (e.g. 2.0.1)
title of the package
description of the package (one or multiple sentences)
list of contributors to the package (not the publication author, but the Poseidon package creator)
name of one contributor
email of one contributor
orcid of one contributor
package version (should be changed/incremented when the package is changed)
date of last modification of the package (should be updated when the package is changed)
genotype data section
genotype data file format
relative path to the geno file. If gzipped, must end with *.gz
md5 checksum of the geno file
relative path to the snp file. If gzipped, must end with *.gz
md5 checksum of the snp file
relative path to the ind file
md5 checksum of the ind file
SNP set in the genotype data
relative path to the .janno file
md5 checksum of the .janno file
relative path to the .ssf file
md5 checksum of the .ssf file
relative path to the .bib file
md5 checksum of the .bib file
relative path to the README file
relative path to the CHANGELOG file
